msg: bug 2388: Enable taint mode and warnings for the installed scripts perl default (can be disabled with PERL_WARN=no PERL_TAINT=no when building). Also fix some bugs in the DESTDIR hacks related to the INSTALLMAN* dirs.

author: felicity
msg: bug 2429: If the 'by' host in the first untrusted line is not resolvable
at all, the code would extend trust to that line and possibly beyond.
